entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
